content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a solution.

Analysis of Main Target Image:
- There are two separate structures in the image:
1. A T-shaped structure with blue blocks forming a T, orange triangular pieces on the sides, and a green block on top
2. A red arch/bridge structure to the right

Structure Details:
- T-shaped structure:
  * Base layer: Blue blocks in T formation with orange triangular pieces
  * Top layer: Single green block on top of the T intersection
- Red arch structure:
  * Single structure with an arched opening

Block Selection and Assembly Order:

For the T-shaped structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 7 (blue cube for T base)
    Step2: Move block with index 8 (blue cube for T base)
    Step3: Move block with index 9 (blue cube for T base)
    Step4: Move block with index 13 (orange triangular piece - left side)
    Step5: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular piece - right side)
    Step6: Move block with index 4 (green cube for top)
}

For the red arch structure:
{
    Step7: Move block with index 2 (red arch piece)
}

This solution uses the exact blocks as shown in the dictionary without any rotation, matching both the shape and color requirements of the target structure.
